Name: To Save Humanity From Virus
About the game: To Save humanity From Virus is a building game where you are on a different planet trying to get resources to create a vaccine. The virus hit the earth and the only way to save humanity is to gather resources from the different planet. As a main hero you are sent to a different planet with your crew to find the vaccine. You are leading the process. First you will need to explore the planet and advance in technology to be able to get what you need. Main resources that will help you to advance: Wood Stone Iron Energy Also once a year a new rocket ship with resources and humans from earth arrives. There are over 20+ buildable objects in the game. You can build and colonise planet as you wish. You have to gather resources faster to create a vaccine before human population dies. And you have to build a rocketship back to earth in TIME!!
